Deathblade.name: Deathblade
Deathblade.effect: On kill or assist, gain +15 attack.

Giant Slayer.name: Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.effect: Basic attacks deal 9% of the target's current health as physical damage.

Hextech Gunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
Hextech Gunblade.effect: Basic Attacks and spells heal for 25% of damage dealt.

Spear of Shojin.name: Spear of Shojin
Spear of Shojin.effect: After casting a spell, basic attacks restore 18% of maximum mana.

Guardian Angel.name: Guardian Angel
Guardian Angel.effect: When the wearer dies, revive with up to 400 health after a 2 second delay once per combat.

Bloodthirster.name: Bloodthirster
Bloodthirster.effect: Basic attacks heal for 40% of damage dealt.

Zeke's Herald.name: Zeke's Herald
Zeke's Herald.effect: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain +20% attack speed.

Guinsoo's Rageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
Guinsoo's Rageblade.effect: On basic attack, gain +4% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.

Statikk Shiv.name: Statikk Shiv
Statikk Shiv.effect: On every third basic attack, deal 80 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies (scales with wearer’s Star Level).

Titan's Resolve.name: Titan's Resolve
Titan's Resolve.effect: When the wearer is hit or inflicts a critical strike, gain a 2% stacking damage bonus, up to 100%. At 50 stacks, gain 25 armor and magic resist. Resets every round.

Runaan's Hurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
Runaan's Hurricane.effect: Basic attacks fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 60% of the wearer's attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

Titanic Hydra.name: Titanic Hydra
Titanic Hydra.effect: Basic attacks deal an additional 3% of the wearer's maximum health as magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies behind them.

Last Whisper.name: Last Whisper
Last Whisper.effect: Critical hits reduce the target’s Armor by 90% for 3 seconds. Effect does not stack.

Rabadon's Deathcap.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Rabadon's Deathcap.effect: The wearer's spell power is +75% more effective.

Luden's Echo.name: Luden's Echo
Luden's Echo.effect: The wearer's spells deal 120/160/200 magic damage (scales with wearer’s Star Level).

Locket of the Iron Solari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
Locket of the Iron Solari.effect: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within two hexes in the same row are shielded 250/275/300 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level).

Ionic Spark.name: Ionic Spark
Ionic Spark.effect: Enemies within 3 hexes that cast a spell are zapped, taking magic damage equal to 200% of their max Mana.

Morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
Morellonomicon.effect: When spell damage burns the target for 18% of the target's maximum health and prevents 80% of healing over 10 seconds. Unique.

Jeweled Gauntlet.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
Jeweled Gauntlet.effect: The wearer's spells can critically strike.

Seraph's Embrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
Seraph's Embrace.effect: Gain 20 Mana after casting a spell.

Frozen Heart.name: Frozen Heart
Frozen Heart.effect: Reduces the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by 40%. Effect does not stack but does increase radius.

Hush.name: Hush
Hush.effect: Basic Attacks have a 20% chance to silence the target, preventing the them from gaining mana for 4 seconds.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.effect: When the wearer falls below 30% health, nearby allies are healed for 1200 Health after a 2.5 second delay. Once per combat.

Hand of Justice.name: Hand of Justice
Hand of Justice.effect: At the start of each planning phase, gain: basic attacks and spells deal +50% damage OR basic attacks heal 50 Health on-hit.

Bramble Vest.name: Bramble Vest
Bramble Vest.effect: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/120/160 magic damage to all nearby enemies (cooldown 1 second). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

Sword Breaker.name: Sword Breaker
Sword Breaker.effect: Basic attacks have a 33% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from Basic Attacking.

Red Buff.name: Red Buff
Red Buff.effect: Basic attacks burn the target, dealing 18% of the target's maximum Health over 10 seconds and preventing 80% of healing.

Iceborn Gauntlet.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
Iceborn Gauntlet.effect: After casting a spell, the wearer’s next basic attack freezes the target for 1.5 seconds.

Dragon's Claw.name: Dragon's Claw
Dragon's Claw.effect: Wearer gains 50% resistance to magic damage.

Zephyr.name: Zephyr
Zephyr.effect: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 6 seconds.

Quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
Quicksilver.effect: The wearer is immune from crowd control.

Warmog's Armor.name: Warmog's Armor
Warmog's Armor.effect: The wearer regens 6% of their missing Health per second.

Trap Claw.name: Trap Claw
Trap Claw.effect: Grants a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 4 seconds.

Force of Nature.name: Force of Nature
Force of Nature.effect: The wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

Thief's Gloves.name: Thief's Gloves
Thief's Gloves.effect: At the start of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.
